name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It was a great week for Jimmy Fallon. He welcomed a baby girl. Congratulations, Fallons! In this modern society, your little girl can grow up to be anything she wants. Except of course a late-night talk-show host.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: A marine biologist in California discovered a very rare 12-pound lobster. He said he planned to return the lobster to the ocean. But today he was seen buying 12 pounds of butter.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: According to a survey, the most popular Christmas song of all time is "Silent Night." The least popular? "Joy Behar to the World." Or "We Three Kardashians." What about "I Saw Mommy Kissing Bill Cosby."
